mapper.select: SELECT u.`name`, l.reason, u.id AS userId, DATE_FORMAT( l.`start`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS `start`, DATE_FORMAT( l.`end`, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS `end`, l.days, l.type, l.`status` FROM tb_leave l JOIN tb_user u ON l.user_id = u.id WHERE l.instance_id=#{instanceId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_leave SET status=#{status} WHERE instance_id=#{instanceId}
